about_the_game:
Your life is falling apart. Alone, amnesiac and charged with the murder of a complete stranger, you turn to your co-workers. Why won't they help you? Why??

Saving yourself from conviction will be no easy task. Find clues to establish an alibi and recover your memories. Break through the selfishness and indifference of the other employees at your tech startup job. Fight to hold yourself together under the crushing stress of a world that's crashing down around you. You've just got to keep it together a little longer...


  • Discuss the mystery with 8 different characters
  • Search for clues in 6 unique environments
  • Make deductions by combining pieces of information to reveal the truth behind the murder
  • Hand drawn, hand animated pixel art graphics inspired by the modern world
  • Full-length original soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes: Contains references to murder and mental health issues.
